channel.title: How to change starter skills?
channel.description:
Hello,
I wonder how to change starter skills? I guess it's something similiar to starteritem, but I can't seem to figure it out... :( help me please.

item.title: How to change starter skills?
item.dc:creator: @h2k h2k
item.description:
@h2k wrote:

problem fixed, thank you for trying guys!

Read full topic

item.title: How to change starter skills?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“TGMagma, post:16, topic:477839”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=596035.msg4196568#msg4196568 date=1357585551]

You can give them ::setskill (skill id) (level they want)

If he doesn’t have that command, he can’t.

Do you have a master,pure, etc, command?
[/quote]

He can add it in can’t he? and yeah, the master,pure command would work also[/quote]
He can, but knowing how skill xp is added would be important.

Read full topic

how to edit that.

item.title: How to change starter skills?
item.dc:creator: @h2k h2k
item.description:
@h2k wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:477839”][quote author=h2k link=topic=596035.msg4196522#msg4196522 date=1357581946]
Hello,

I wonder how to change starter skills? I guess it’s something similiar to starteritem, but I can’t seem to figure it out…
help me please.
[/quote]
Well, find the skill ID of what get added on your starter, search for it, and change it. You can also search the XP[/quote]

so you want me to search “0” thro 3242r543242 files?
And I don’t know where is the method that adds skills on start.

Read full topic
